item.description: As a part of CS 348, Introduction to Database Management, we had the option to create a project using a database.

item.title: UW Debate Vlog — Vietnam WUDC 2024
item.description: I spent the winter break in Vietnam competing at the World Universities Debating Championship 2024, and also filmed a vlog for it!

item.description: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.

item.title: SE 101 Final Project: Full Stack Arduino Exercise Tracker (4Gains)
item.description: Our final project for SE101 was supposed to be a exercise tracker device that would revolutionize the fitness experience.
